@LashaKrikheli @kurtiskemple @gatsbyjs @Netlify Form submissions can also fire webhooks so you can integrate with anything that can receive those. Or you could respond via a serverless function. @Netlify provides automated function triggers on form submissions to make that easier: https://t.co/occwxNHmHg
